rooms.description: Open-plan living and dining area with Art Deco accents. Features built-in seating, decorative molding, and a statement chandelier aligned with Vastu principles.
Open-plan kitchen integrated into living area. Equipped with modern fixtures and Art Deco design elements ensuring energy flow according to Vastu.
Dedicated space for servants with functional layout and built-in storage. Designed to maintain privacy while aligning with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Large entrance door facing east (Vastu approved) with Art Deco detailing.
Service entrance leading to servant's quarters located on north-west side.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and dressing area. Decorated with Art Deco fixtures ensuring a sense of luxury.
Secondary bedroom designed for comfort and privacy. Incorporates Vastu recommendations for optimal energy flow.
Additional bedroom ensuring family functionality with subtle Art Deco details and Vastu alignment.

openings.description: Balcony adjoining the master bedroom offering outdoor view and air circulation.

rooms.description: Dedicated utility area for storage and maintenance. Includes areas for laundry and HVAC equipment.

openings.description: Exit for service vehicles and maintenance activities from the ground floor to lower level.
